title: Andrew Yang Interview and More
itunes:title: Andrew Yang Interview and More
description:
Today on the show we had Andrew Yang call in where he made his announcement that he will be running for Mayor in NYC! He also spoke about the Trump supporters storming the capitol and what he thinks the next steps will be with Trump's impeachment. Moreover, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to another crazy Florida person, this time a techer was arrested for spraying students with disinfectant spray for not wearing their mask properly and Angela helped some listeners out during "Ask Yee".

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
